text: Richard Walker Mallary (February 21, 1929 â€“ September 27, 2011) was an American politician. He was as a U.S. Representative from Vermont representing Vermont's At-large congressional district from 1972 to 1975. Mallary died of prostate cancer in Brookfield, Vermont, aged 82.Candace Page, Burlington Free Press, Former U.S. Rep.
